description: While over-75s will get free TV licences this year, the position from next year has yet to be agreed.
title: Free TV licences for Isle of Man over-75s 'to continue until end of 2020'
title_page: Free TV licences for Isle of Man over-75s 'to continue until end of 2020' - BBC News
maintext: Chris Thomas told the House of Keys the "current concession and arrangements" between the BBC and the Manx government would "remain in place" until the end of December.
